basics.label: R&D Product Development Engineer, Research Assistant, Mechanical Technician

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Design and build a tail-sitter VTOL(vertical take off and landing) UAV(unmanned aerial vehicle) which takes off and lands vertically and travels horizontally. Main duties include but not limit to aerodynamics modeling, UAV control system design, mechanical manufacturing, simulation and tuning/experiments.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Research assistant for Wharton School environment economics projects on Europe Emission Trading System (EU ETC). Main duties include large scale data collecting, cleaning, merging, database construction and data analysis, etc. Completed with skills ranging from Java, python, Navicat SQLite database software and STATA (data analyzing software).

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Check, report on reducer components, automobile chassis producing, processing and assembly line. Trained in mechanical manufacturing fundamentals in industrial production of automobiles.

education.institution: University of Pennsylvania, School of Eng. and Applied Science

awards.title: Honor Mention Prize (30%), MCM: The Mathematical Contest in Modeling
